name: Simbot
description:
A game developer father is obsessed with his mysterious project that even his son is unaware of. One day, out of curiosity, the son managed to sneak into his father’s office and approached a computer. An AI called “Neko” told the boy that his father has been "sucked" into the game and he needs to rescue his father by reaching the game’s “core”. Unfortunately, the AI is unable to navigate itself so it is up to the boy to control Neko and help it reach the core to rescue his father.

The player plays as the boy on the mission to save his father. The player has to create block-based programs to control different forms of Neko to reach the finish point of each mission. Throughout the boy's journey are difficult programming missions and deadly obstacles. Will the boy succeed and get to see his father again?
